member.name: P:C1.WPF.Extended.C1Book.DropTolerance
member.summary: Gets or sets the position where pages begin to turn when dropped. If the value is 0.0, the default, pages only turns if dropped over the opposite page. Positive values are understood of a proportion of the page width that still trigger a page turn. If value is 0.1, dropping a left page 10 percent to the left of the center of the book still turns the page.

member.name: T:C1.WPF.Extended.C1Accordion
member.remarks: C1Accordion is an so items are added to the collection or a collection is set to . Either way, if a UIElement is added that is not a it is shown inside a C1AccordionItem as its Content. When using the behavior is similar. If the template doesn't generate a C1AccordionItem, the generated element from the template is shown inside a C1AccordionItem. C1Accordion uses a Grid as its ItemsPanel. If is set to a different Panel the layout won't work correctly.
member.summary: that contains . It allows only one item to be expanded at a time (similar to the NavigationBar in Outlook).
